T02D3712:100a-1: t'i y'a na bya ba stv'am na n'a ma /
T02D3712:100a-3: theg pa gsum rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba /
T02D3712:100a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3712:100a-6: gang gi theg gsum nyid bzhon sbyin pa'i phyag na ri rab brkyang nas //
T02D3712:100a-7: rang gi sha dang khrag dag chags bral 'gro la rnam 'gyed pa //
T02D3712:100a-8: theg gsum gsung po sh'akya dbang po nyid la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D3712:100a-9: bla ma'i bka' dang gzhung mang mthong phyir theg gsum rnam gzhag bya //
T02D3712:100a-10: theg pa rnams ni gsum nyid du rnam par gzhag par mthong ste /
T02D3712:100a-11: nyan thos dang ldan pa'i theg pa dang /
T02D3712:100a-12: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
T02D3712:100a-13: zab cing rgya che ba dang ldan pa'i theg pa'o //
T02D3712:100a-14: de la nyan thos dang ldan pa'i theg pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D3712:100a-17: yang bye brag tu smra ba ni /
T02D3712:100a-20: nga ni rang gi grub pa'i mtha' cung zad brjod de /
T02D3712:100a-21: dbang po dang don las 'byung ba'i blo rnam pa med cing /
T02D3712:100a-22: dbang po don ma lus pa ni gong bu dang
T02D3712:100a-23: mthun par gnas pa'i rdul phra rab cha shas med
T02D3712:100b-0: pa'i ngo bor @100b rtog cing 'dus byas thams cad
T02D3712:100b-1: mi rtag la bdag med par 'dod pas te /
T02D3712:100b-2: nam mkha' dang 'gog pa dag dang /
T02D3712:100b-3: de bzhin nyid rnams rta par 'dod pas rnam par spyod pa 'o //
T02D3712:100b-4: 'di dag ni 'bras bu me shi ba ltar bstan du med pa dang /
T02D3712:100b-5: de'i sngon du song ba'i phung po lhag ma dang
T02D3712:100b-6: bcas pa zhes bya ba dang gnyis su grub pa
T02D3712:100b-7: byed pa ste / de dag grub pa gcig dang
T02D3712:100b-8: sgrub pa la gnas pa bdun gyi skyes bu 'phags
T02D3712:100b-9: pa'i khongs su gtogs pa zung bzhi dang /
T02D3712:100b-10: gang zag brgyad ces bsgrags pa 'di lta 'di ltar rgyun du zhugs par zhugs pa dang /
T02D3712:100b-12: lan cig phyir 'od pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang /
T02D3712:100b-14: phyir mi 'ong ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang /
T02D3712:100b-16: dgra bcom pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang /
T02D3712:100b-17: dgra bcom pa ste go rims bzhin no //
T02D3712:100b-18: yul dbus kyi bye brag tu smra ba rnams kyang gnas 'di rnams mnyam ba ste /
T02D3712:100b-19: phra mo dag ni de dag nyid 'don pa'i chos mngon pa rgya cher blta'o //
T02D3712:100b-20: mdo sde pa rnams ni blo rnam pa dang bcas
T02D3712:100b-21: pa nyid du skye bar rtog cing blo'i rnam pa
T02D3712:100b-22: rnams kyang de dang 'dra ba gzhan gyi rnam pa
T02D3712:100b-23: las skye la / de yang rdul phra rab kha
T02D3712:100b-24: dog dang rjes su mthun par gnas pa'i bdag nyid
T02D3712:100b-25: las skye la / du 'dod do // yang 'di
T02D3712:100b-26: dag ni dus gsum dag 'di khas mi len cing
T02D3712:100b-27: 'dus ma byas rnams kyang mo gsham gyi bu dang
T02D3712:100b-29: 'bras bu dang de la 'dod pa dang gnas pa snga ma bzhin te /
T02D3712:100b-30: 'on kyang mdo sde pa rnams ni rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i skal ba can no //
T02D3712:100b-31: 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa rnam par gzhag pa 'o //
T02D3712:100b-32: zhugs pa dang de la gnas pa dang //
T02D3712:100b-33: de nyid dbang po'i khyad par gyis bse ru ltar rgyu ba dang tshogs dang /
T02D3712:100b-34: spyod pa dang bzhir sangs rgyas ni rnam par gnyis las bzhir 'gyur ba'o //
T02D3712:100b-35: 'di dag gi khong du chud pa ni mthun par
T02D3712:100b-36: rten cing 'brel bar 'gyur ba yan lag bcu gnyis
T02D3712:100b-38: de 'gags pas mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar rtogs pa 'o //
T02D3712:100b-39: 'dir 'di dag gi bar chad med pa'i lam nyi tshe bshad pa ltar yin gyi /
T02D3712:101a-0: 'bras bu thob pa la phan pa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims @101a * //
T02D3712:101a-1: la sogs pa ni nyan thos rnams dang mthun par de la 'byung zhing /
T02D3712:101a-2: 'bras bu'i bdag nyid kyang zhi ba nyid nyan thos rnams dang mnyam pas gnas pa'o //
T02D3712:101a-3: 'di dag la nges par tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa 'byung ba dang /
T02D3712:101a-4: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba'i
T02D3712:101a-5: rkyen 'byung ba ni tshong dpon bden par smra ba
T02D3712:101a-6: bzhin te / bskal pa brgya'i bar du de dang
T02D3712:101a-7: 'brel ba'i las de dag gis bsags pa'i phyir ro
T02D3712:101a-8: bzhin te / // rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
T02D3712:101a-9: rnams ji ltar bsgom pa ni 'dir ma smras te
T02D3712:101a-10: bzhin te / // / gzhung mangs pa la mi dga' ba dang /
T02D3712:101a-11: mdo sde rnams las gsal bar snang bas so //
T02D3712:101a-12: 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnam par gzhag pa'o //
T02D3712:101a-13: zab cing rgya che ba dang ldan pa'i theg pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D3712:101a-14: zab pa 'ba' zhig dang ldan pa dang /
T02D3712:101a-16: rgya che ba gnyi ga dang ldan pa'o //
T02D3712:101a-17: 'di dag nyid la theg pa chen po zhes brjod cing /
T02D3712:101a-18: dbye ba rnam pa gnyis nyid la slob dpon snga mas pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul dang /
T02D3712:101a-19: gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi theg pa chen po zhes kyang gzhag pa'o //
T02D3712:101a-20: gal te gcig la ni zab pa nyi tshe ldan zhing /
T02D3712:101a-21: de bzhin du gcig la ni zab pa dang rgya che ba gnyi ga dang ldan na /
T02D3712:101a-22: de'i tshe theg pa dag ni bzhir 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
T02D3712:101a-23: ji ltar na theg pa gsum du rnam par gzhag ce na /
T02D3712:101a-25: bden pa gnyis la gnas pas bdag dang gzhan gyi
T02D3712:101a-26: don phun sum tshogs pa bsgrub pa la dbye ba
T02D3712:101a-27: med pas so // de lta na ci'i phyir zab pa 'ba' zhig dang ldan pa dang /
T02D3712:101a-28: zab cing rgya che ba gnyi ga dang ldan pa'i khyad par 'byung /
T02D3712:101a-29: gzhan du na 'di dag gi bden pa gnyis nyid la khyad par yod par brjod dgos so //
T02D3712:101a-30: 'di ni legs par smras pa ste /
T02D3712:101a-31: don dam pa'i bden pa nyid la ni nam yang dbye ba 'ga' zhig kyang 'byung ba med la /
T02D3712:101a-32: kun rdzob nyid kyi zab pa dang rgya che bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02D3712:101a-33: ci'i phyir kun rdzob kyi bden pa la khyad par yod kyi /
T02D3712:101a-34: don dam pa'i bden pa la de mi dmigs /
T02D3712:101a-35: kun rdzob tsam gyis rgya che bar yang ji ltar 'gyur /
T02D3712:101a-36: 'di na don dam pa'i bden pa dbu ma pa
T02D3712:101b-0: rnams kyis @101b rnam par gzhag pa ni yod pa
T02D3712:101b-2: yod pa dang med pa gnyig dang /
T02D3712:101b-3: yod pa dang med pa gnyi ga ma yin pa
T02D3712:101b-4: zhes bya ba'i mtha' rnam pa bzhi las nges par
T02D3712:101b-5: grol pa / spros pa'i mtshan ma nub pa dag gi las 'das pa nyid yin no //
T02D3712:101b-6: tshul 'di las gzhan pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa
T02D3712:101b-7: rnam par 'jog na de'i tshe nges par yod pa
T02D3712:101b-8: la sogs pa'i mtha' rnam pa bzhir 'jug par 'gyur
T02D3712:101b-9: te / gang mtha' rnam pa bzhi yang ma yin
T02D3712:101b-10: la dbu ma dag gis rnam par gzhag pa'i bden
T02D3712:101b-11: pa yang ma yin pa de ni nam yang brnyes
T02D3712:101b-13: gal te mtha' rnam pa bzhi las 'ga' zhig don
T02D3712:101b-14: dam pa'i bden par yongs su rtogs na de'i tshe
T02D3712:101b-15: rnal 'byor spyod pa pa kho na bas 'bad pa
T02D3712:101b-16: chung dus rnam par bzlog par nus so //
T02D3712:101b-17: de'i phyir don dam pa'i bden pa bcom ldan 'das
T02D3712:101b-18: dang klu sgrub la sogs pas rnam par gzhag pa
T02D3712:101b-19: las khyad par gyur pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa
T02D3712:101b-21: kun rdzob tsam gyi ltar rgya che bar 'gyur zhes gang smras pa ni 'dir /
T02D3712:101b-22: dmigs pa rnam par dag pa dang //
T02D3712:101b-23: grogs kyi mthu dang spyod pa yis //
T02D3712:101b-24: blo ldan rnams kyi theg pa ni //
T02D3712:101b-25: chen po'i chen po nyid du bsgrags //
T02D3712:101b-26: 'di'i don ni ji ltar snang ba'i dmigs pa rnams
T02D3712:101b-27: rnam par dag pa'i lha'i bdag nyid du mngon par
T02D3712:101b-28: rtogs pas // dmigs pa rgya che ba dang /
T02D3712:101b-29: dus gsum du rgyal ba rnams kyis brten pa'i dam
T02D3712:101b-30: tshig rnams yid bzhin du bzung bas khyad par du
T02D3712:101b-31: byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs skye bar 'gyur ba grogs
T02D3712:101b-32: zhes bya ba rgya che ba dang /
T02D3712:101b-33: ji ltar sangs rgyas dang sa bcu'i dbang phyug rnams 'gro ba'i don spyod pa dang /
T02D3712:101b-34: zhing yongs su dag par byin gyis rlob pa ltar
T02D3712:101b-35: rjes su skyes pa'i spyod pa rgya che ba ste
T02D3712:101b-36: / 'di dag dbu ma pa rnams las khyad par
T02D3712:101b-37: du gyur pas de dag la rgya che ba nyid
T02D3712:101b-39: de bas kun rdzob kho nas rnam bar gzhag pa'i bye brag go //
T02D3712:101b-40: rgya che ba rnam pa de dag gis ni theg
T02D3712:101b-41: pa rnams sangs rgyas dang mnyam par bkod pa ma
T02D3712:101b-42: yin nam / de lta na ni don dam pa'i
T02D3712:101b-43: bden pa kho na dang cig shos bye bar mi
T02D3712:101b-44: yin nam / 'gyur te / thams cad 'bras bu la gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T02D3712:102a-1: gang 'dir don dam pa'i bden pa lhun gyis grub
T02D3712:102a-2: pa la sogs pas mi 'jug pa ltar ni 'di'i
T02D3712:102a-4: ji srid don dam pa rtogs pa de srid rtsol ba dang bcas shing lhag par spyod pas so //
T02D3712:102a-5: de ltar na ni dbu ma pa rnams kyang yin
T02D3712:102a-6: pas 'di la zab cing rgya che ba dang ldan
T02D3712:102a-7: par ji ltar brjod ce na ma yin te /
T02D3712:102a-8: dbu ma pa rnams ni rgya che ba dang bral bas /
T02D3712:102a-9: bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyi 'bras bu la 'jug cing /
T02D3712:102a-10: rnal 'byor spyod pa pa rnams kyang ngo //
T02D3712:102a-11: de bzhin du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams
T02D3712:102a-12: kyang bskal pa grangs med pa bzhis rang gi 'bras
T02D3712:102a-14: theg pa'i mchog la zhon pa rnams ni dus cung
T02D3712:102a-15: zad kyis mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa
T02D3712:102a-16: thob ste / de bas na khyad par chen po dang bcas pa'o //
T02D3712:102a-17: de lta yin du zin kyang 'di na don dam pa'i bden pa dang dbyer med de /
T02D3712:102a-18: don dam pa'i bden pa yongs su grub pa byang
T02D3712:102a-19: chub sems dpa' byams pas thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i
T02D3712:102a-20: spyod pas btsun mo'i 'khor du rnam par rtse ba
T02D3712:102a-21: la sogs pa spyod pas 'gro ba smin par 'gyur
T02D3712:102a-22: zhing bdag nyid kun du 'ching ba mi 'byung ba
T02D3712:102a-23: ltar theg pa 'di la gnas pa rnams kyang thabs
T02D3712:102a-24: dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa la sogs pa
T02D3712:102a-25: smad pa rnam pa du ma spyad pas tshogs yongs
T02D3712:102a-27: 'di ni thabs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rmad du byung ba nyid de /
T02D3712:102a-28: skye bo gang dag lhag par chags pa dang ldan pa dang /
T02D3712:102a-29: de bzhin lhag par nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i bar rnams nyan thos dang /
T02D3712:102a-30: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sogs pa la
T02D3712:102a-31: sbyangs pa thar pa'i skal ba can ma yin pa
T02D3712:102a-32: rnams la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i spyod pa la
T02D3712:102a-33: sogs pa bstan pas sems yongs su dga' bar byas
T02D3712:102a-34: te / rim gyis tshogs yongs su bsags nas sems
T02D3712:102a-35: kyi rgyud gser bsregs pa ltar gyur pa na 'dod
T02D3712:102a-36: chags dang bral ba'i spyod pa rdzogs pa'i rim pa
T02D3712:102a-37: kun nas spros pa dang bral ba nyid rtogs par
T02D3712:102a-38: te / 'gyur te / de bas na theg pa'i
T02D3712:102a-39: mchog 'di nyid skye bo ma lus pa bzhon par
T02D3712:102a-40: bya ba dam pa rnams yid 'phrog pa'o //
T02D3712:102b-0: de'i phyir zla gsang thig le la @102b sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud rnams las /
T02D3712:102b-1: mi bza' ba ni cung zad med //
T02D3712:102b-2: mi bya ba ni cung zad med //
T02D3712:102b-3: thams cad thabs shes sems kyis ni //
T02D3712:102b-4: dogs med gyur pas longs spyod bya / zhes bya
T02D3712:102b-5: ba la sogs brgya cher gsungs pa ni don gyi
T02D3712:102b-6: dbang rnam pa gnyis la brten pa ste /
T02D3712:102b-7: skye bo gang dag theg pa gzhan las spangs pa
T02D3712:102b-8: rnams chad pa stong pas me 'bar ba'i khyim nas
T02D3712:102b-9: 'byung ba ltar dregs pa drang ba tsam gyi ched
T02D3712:102b-10: du gsungs la / yang gang dag yul ring por
T02D3712:102b-11: rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgoms pas 'dod chags la sogs
T02D3712:102b-12: pas mi 'phrogs pa 'dam gyi padma lta bu rnams
T02D3712:102b-13: kho na la brten te gsungs pa'o //
T02D3712:102b-14: gzhan du 'dod chags la sogs pa tha mal bas 'ching bar mi 'gyur na /
T02D3712:102b-15: skye bo thams cad thar pa'i gnas su phyin par 'gyur la /
T02D3712:102b-16: dam tshig las nyams pa yang 'ga' yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T02D3712:102b-17: de nyid kyis ngan song yang rnam par chad par thar bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3712:102b-18: de'i phyir gang dag stong pa nyid la sems mngon
T02D3712:102b-19: par dad pa de dag gis kyang 'dod chags la
T02D3712:102b-20: sogs pa'i 'bras bu nges par nyams su myong bar
T02D3712:102b-21: bya dgos te / lha'i rnal 'byor yang /
T02D3712:102b-22: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong ba'i bar
T02D3712:102b-23: chad byed pa na 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams
T02D3712:102b-25: de'i phyir rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan zhes bya
T02D3712:102b-26: ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las rnam pa mang
T02D3712:102b-27: por kun rdzob kyi bden pa rnam par bzhag nas
T02D3712:102b-28: yang gsungs pa / dngos med nyid kyi phyogs la yang //
T02D3712:102b-29: las kyi 'bras bu la sogs pa //
T02D3712:102b-30: rmi lam bzhin du nyams myong ba //
T02D3712:102b-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgya chen don dam
T02D3712:102b-33: pa'i bden pa mngon du ma gyur gyi bar du
T02D3712:102b-34: kun rdzob bden pa la gus pas gnas par gsungs
T02D3712:102b-35: so // 'di ni kun rdzob nyid du yang ma
T02D3712:102b-36: dag par med par smra ba 'ga' zhig byung na
T02D3712:102b-37: ni mngon sum du rigs pa sbyin zhing bden pa
T02D3712:102b-39: theg pa rab kyi mchog 'di ni //
T02D3712:102b-40: tshul la gnas na thob par 'gyur //
T02D3712:102b-41: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyud rnams tshig med par 'gyur te /
T02D3712:102b-42: de'i tshe don dam pa'i bden pa kho na la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D3712:103a-1: ji ltar dug sngags kyis rims mi 'phel ba zhes bya ba thos pa tsam dang /
T02D3712:103a-2: gzung ba dang de shes pa la dug mi gnod
T02D3712:103a-3: par shes pa tsam gyis ni dug chen po rnams
T02D3712:103a-4: zhi bar nus pa ma yin gyi yongs su bsgrubs
T02D3712:103a-5: pa'i skyes bus zhi bar byed do //
T02D3712:103a-6: de bzhin du de kho na'i rnam par dag pa thos pa dang /
T02D3712:103a-7: der 'gyur ba'i lam ston pa gzung ba dang /
T02D3712:103a-8: rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa rnams 'ching bar mi 'gyur /
T02D3712:103a-9: shes pa tsam gyis 'dod chags la sogs pas mi
T02D3712:103a-10: gnod par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no zhes bya
T02D3712:103a-11: ba'o // shin tu spros pas chog go //
T02D3712:103a-12: rang gi brjod par bya ba nges par gzung ste /
T02D3712:103a-14: dbu ma pa'i dbye bas zab pa tsam dang ldan pa'i theg pa ni rnam pa gnyis yin la /
T02D3712:103a-16: shes pa rnam pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02D3712:103a-17: rnam pa med pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis so //
T02D3712:103a-18: de bzhin du dbu ma pa yang kun rdzob shes pa'i rnam par smra ba dang /
T02D3712:103a-19: de bag chags su smra ba'i bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis so //
T02D3712:103a-20: da ni de dag gi 'dod pa'i rang bzhin brjod de /
T02D3712:103a-21: shes pa rnam pa dang bcas pa rnams ni sems
T02D3712:103a-22: rang rig pa skad cig ma'i bdag nyid mi rtag
T02D3712:103a-23: pa rgyun ma chad par 'byung ba 'di nyid kyi
T02D3712:103a-24: phyi rol lta bur rnam par gnas pa'i don nyams
T02D3712:103a-25: su myong ba yin gyis 'di na bdag dang skyes
T02D3712:103a-26: bu la sogs pa'i 'dzin pa po gzhan ni 'ga'
T02D3712:103a-27: yang med la / phyi rol na dum bur gyur
T02D3712:103a-28: pa ltar gnas pa'i don rnams ni rang gi rnam
T02D3712:103a-29: par shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa de ltar nam
T02D3712:103a-30: mkha' la brten nas snang ba 'byung gi / gzhan
T02D3712:103a-31: dbang phyug gis phyung ba la sogs pa'i don gzung
T02D3712:103a-32: bar bya ba ni 'ga' yang med pa'o //
T02D3712:103a-33: thams cad rang gi rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid
T02D3712:103a-34: kho na bas gang la yang rjes su ma chags
T02D3712:103a-35: pa dang khong khro ba la sogs pa'i skabs mi
T02D3712:103a-36: 'byed par tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /
T02D3712:103a-37: sems de nyid rnam par dag pa'i ye shes tha
T02D3712:103a-38: mal pa'i mngon par zhen pa dang bral ba'i bdag
T02D3712:103a-39: nyid skad cig ma rjes su 'brel par 'byung bar
T02D3712:103a-40: gnas gyur pa ni 'bras bu sangs rgyas zhes rtog
T02D3712:103b-0: pa'o // shes pa @103b rnam pa med par smra
T02D3712:103b-1: ba rnams ni sems rang rig pa rgyun 'brel par
T02D3712:103b-2: 'jug pa skad cig ma'i bdag nyid rnam pa dang
T02D3712:103b-3: bral ba 'ga' yang rig par mi byed pa de
T02D3712:103b-4: dag gcig dang tha dad las grol ba'i bag chags
T02D3712:103b-6: rnam pa thams cad dang bral ba rang rig pa'i
T02D3712:103b-7: bdag nyid kyi bems po ma yin pa'i ye shes
T02D3712:103b-8: su gnas yongs su gyur pa 'di ni 'bras bu
T02D3712:103b-9: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su rnam par
T02D3712:103b-11: dbu ma pa kun rdzob shes pa'i rnam par smra
T02D3712:103b-12: ba rnams ni don dam pa'i rigs pa'i tshogs kyis
T02D3712:103b-13: sems dang ye shes dag yod pa ma yin par
T02D3712:103b-14: smra la / kun rdzob tu 'di ltar rnam par
T02D3712:103b-15: gzhag pa thams cad sems dang yid kyi rnam pa
T02D3712:103b-16: yul du gnas pa kho nar rtog go //
T02D3712:103b-17: de bzhin du kun rdzob bag chags su smra ba
T02D3712:103b-18: rnams kyi 'dod pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa
T02D3712:103b-19: snga ma lta bu las kun rdzob tu rnam par
T02D3712:103b-20: gzhag pa rnams ni bag chags rnams kho na yin
T02D3712:103b-21: gyi / sems ni rnam pa dang /
T02D3712:103b-22: 'gro ba'i bdag nyid du snang ba ma yin no zhes par ro //
T02D3712:103b-23: 'di gnyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i bdag nyid 'dod pa dang /
T02D3712:103b-24: sems dang rang rig pa 'gog / rigs pa bsgrub pa ni mthun no //
T02D3712:103b-25: kha cig na re 'di gnyis kyis lta ba gzhan sel ba na rim pa bzhin du /
T02D3712:103b-26: yod dang med dang yod med dang //
T02D3712:103b-27: yod med gnyi ga min pa ste //
T02D3712:103b-29: rtag dang mi rtag rtag mi rtag / rtag dang mi rtag gnyi ga min //
T02D3712:103b-30: zhes pas go rims bzhin du mu bzhi rnam par rtog pa mi 'dra'o zhes zer ro //
T02D3712:103b-31: zab cing rgya che ba dang ldan pa'i theg pa ni bya ba dang /
T02D3712:103b-35: rnal 'byor bla na med pa zhes bya bas rnam pa lngar 'gyur ro //
T02D3712:103b-36: 'dir 'di dag gi rang gi ngo bo ni rnam
T02D3712:103b-37: par gsal bar bla ma rnams kho na las shes
T02D3712:103b-38: par nus kyi / gzhung gi tshig rnam par sbyar bas ma yin pa dang /
T02D3712:103b-39: rags pa rnams ni de kho na la 'jug pa
T02D3712:103b-40: la sogs pa'i gzhung rnams su yang rnam par gtan
T02D3712:103b-41: la phab bas / 'dir bdag gis gsal bar dbye bar mi bya bar gzhag go //
T02D3712:104a-1: zab cing rgya che ba'i theg pa'i rnam par gzhag ba'o //
T02D3712:104a-2: gal te theg pa gsum kho na yin na theg
T02D3712:104a-3: pa gcig tu rnam par bshad pa de ji ltar
T02D3712:104a-4: 'gyur / 'di ni nges pa med de 'bras bu la dang /
T02D3712:104a-5: rgyu la brten pa'i phyir te /
T02D3712:104a-6: theg pa thams cad nges par nye ba dang ring
T02D3712:104a-7: ba rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur bas 'bras bu
T02D3712:104a-8: la brten pa bshad pa ste /
T02D3712:104a-9: de bas na mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las /
T02D3712:104a-10: theg pa gsum gyis nges 'byung la //
T02D3712:104a-11: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //
T02D3712:104a-12: zhes gsungs pa nyid theg pa thams cad 'bras bu
T02D3712:104a-13: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar
T02D3712:104a-14: dgongs la / bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal yang gdul
T02D3712:104a-15: bya'i dbang las theg pa gsum char la zhon cing
T02D3712:104a-16: dgongs la / / chos kyi sku las kyang ma g-yos ba'o zhes bstod pa brjod pa'o //
T02D3712:104a-17: rgyu las kyang theg pa thams cad ni bdag dang gzhan la spong zhing /
T02D3712:104a-18: 'bras bu sangs rgyas nyid skyed pa dang /
T02D3712:104a-19: chos kyi dbyings la tha dad pa med pa na ste /
T02D3712:104a-21: theg pa gcig cing tshul yang gcig yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs so //
T02D3712:104a-22: gal te 'ga' zhig theg pa bsam gyis mi khyab
T02D3712:104a-23: par bsgrub pa bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' lang kar
T02D3712:104a-24: gshegs pa la sogs pa'i mdo las shes so zhe
T02D3712:104a-26: ji srid sems ni 'jug gi bar //
T02D3712:104a-27: theg pa dag la thug ba med cing bya ba
T02D3712:104a-28: 'di ni theg pa gsum rnam par gzhag pa zhon
T02D3712:104a-29: pa'i theg pa pa rnams nyid kha cig rten cing
T02D3712:104a-30: 'brel par 'byung ba mngon du byed pa dang /
T02D3712:104a-31: la la mi sdug pa sgom pa dang /
T02D3712:104a-32: la la zad par gyi skye mched sgom pa'i bar
T02D3712:104a-33: gyis zhugs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gzigs
T02D3712:104a-34: pa yin gyi rnam par gzhag pa gsum gyis bsdus
T02D3712:104a-35: pa'i theg pa gzhan ni mi 'byung ste /
T02D3712:104a-36: de dag las gzhan pa'i lta ba ni nges par phyi rol mu stegs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D3712:104a-37: de ltar theg pa gsum rnams gsal bkod pas //
T02D3712:104a-38: 'gro rnams gus bcas theg gsum myur zhon nas //
T02D3712:104a-39: srid mtsho las rgal bde ba chen po'i bdag /
T02D3712:104a-40: stug po bkod pa nyid du 'gyur bar shog /
T02D3712:104a-41: theg pa gsum rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba
T02D3712:104b-0: slob dpon @104b mkhas pa chen po rin chen 'byung
T02D3712:104b-1: gnas zhi ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so
T02D3712:104b-3: / // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po krishna pa dang /
T02D3712:104b-4: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong chos kyi
